parameter.name: idmap_script
parameter.description: Dynamic UID/GID mapping script, which runs when no cached mapping exists. A valid mapping is cached and reused for subsequent logins. The following environment variables are set: USERNAME, ACCESS_TOKEN, OBJECT_ID, TENANT_ID, DOMAIN. ACCESS_TOKEN is empty when offline. The script is executed by the himmelblaud_tasks daemon. The script must print a single line to stdout in the following format: .RS 4 .nf uid=<value>,gid=<value> .fi .RE Returns a non-zero exit code to fail the login. If the script exits 0 with no output, Himmelblau falls back to the default UID/GID resolution.
